title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.47 - Information for commission, State Tax Department
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.47 - Information for commission, State Tax Department

State Regulations

Racing associations shall promptly give to the
commission and to the State Tax Department such information in writing as
either may request from time to time and shall freely and fully cooperate with
them in every way. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4003.47

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
